content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in Munich. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: Good evening, Nesibe. Thank you for coming to see the apartment. As the landlord, I am interested in maximizing my gains from renting out this space. Would you like to propose a rental price for the apartment?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I would like to have the apartment for the lowest possible price. What is your proposed rental price?
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content: As the landlord, I am looking for the highest possible rental price for this apartment. However, I am also open to negotiating a fair price that works for both of us. Can we discuss the rental price you are willing to pay and see if we can come to an agreement?
name: Heinrich Heine

content:
I am willing to pay 800 Euro per month for the apartment.

What is your proposed rental price?

The apartment is 25 square meters.

Thank you for your time.

I will think it over and get back to you.

I agree to the price of 800 Euro.

TERMINATE
name: Nesibe Trabelsi from Tunesia

content:
Thank you for your proposal, Nesibe. As the landlord, I am looking for a rental price that maximizes my gains while also being fair for you. I am willing to negotiate, but I do want to ensure that the rental price covers my costs and provides a reasonable return on my investment.

I appreciate your willingness to pay 800 Euro per month, but I would like to propose a rental price of 900 Euro per month. This price takes into account the costs of maintaining the apartment and provides a reasonable return on my investment.

I understand that you may have concerns about the rental price, but I believe that this is a fair and reasonable price for the size and location of the apartment. I am open to discussing any concerns you may have and working together to find a solution that works for both of us.

If you have any questions or concerns, please do not hesitate to reach out. I look forward to hearing from you soon.
name: Heinrich Heine
